title.native: 無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～
title.romaji: Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu

description:
When a 34-year-old underachiever gets run over by a bus, his story doesn’t end there. Reincarnated in a new world as an infant, Rudeus will seize every opportunity to live the life he’s always wanted. Armed with new friends, some freshly acquired magical abilities, and the courage to do the things he’s always dreamed of, he’s embarking on an epic adventure—with all of his past experience intact!

(Source: Funimation, edited)

Note: The anime pre-screened its 1st and 2nd episode starting on the 27th of December on the Nico Nico Live Broadcasting and D Anime Store services
synonyms: Jobless Reincarnation: I Will Seriously Try If I Go To Another World
无职转生 ~到了异世界就拿出真本事~
เกิดชาตินี้พี่ต้องเทพ

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Virginity
tags.description: Features a male character who has never had sexual relations (until now).

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Hypersexuality
tags.description: Portrays a character with a hypersexuality disorder, compulsive sexual behavior, or sex addiction.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Masturbation
tags.description: Features erotic stimulation of one's own genitalia or other erogenous regions.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Polyamorous
tags.description: Features a character who is in a consenting relationship with multiple people at one time.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Magote_rihujin) | [Syosetu](https://mypage.syosetu.com/288399/) | [Twicomi](https://twicomi.com/author/Magote_rihujin/page/1)

Rifujin na Magonote (理不尽な孫の手) is the pseudonym of a Japanese author best known for his original novel series "[Mushoku Tensei](https://anilist.co/manga/85470/Mushoku-Tensei-Isekai-Ittara-Honki-Dasu/)" and "[Orc Eroica](https://anilist.co/manga/119987/Orc-Eiyuu-Monogatari-Sontaku-Retsuden/)". Magonote rarely appears on-camera and likes to keep his privacy. When he does make an appearance, he wears a characteristic helmet to cover his face. ~!This helmet is of the same model donned by [Orsted](https://anilist.co/character/187382/Orsted) to keep his curse at bay.!~

Magonote first started uploading his work on the user-generated novel publishing site, Shosetsuka ni Naro in November of 2012. His first upload was the web novel [Mushoku Tensei](https://anilist.co/manga/85470/Mushoku-Tensei-Isekai-Ittara-Honki-Dasu/). The series quickly gained the support of readers, hitting number one on the site’s combined popularity ranking within 1 year of publication. Within the next one-and-half years, Kadokawa licensed the Mushoku Tensei series under their MF Books imprint and started publishing the story as a light novel with illustrations by a Pixiv user named [Shirotaka](https://anilist.co/staff/118744/Sirotaka). The first volume was shipped on January 23 of 2014.

In 2019, he started a web novel titled [Orc Erotica](https://anilist.co/manga/119987/Orc-Eiyuu-Monogatari-Sontaku-Retsuden/) on Shosetsuka ni Naro, which in the subsequent year was also acquired by Kadokawa and started publishing the story in light novel format under their Fujimi Fantasia Bunko imprint. The illustrations were provided by ero-doujinshi artist [Asanagi](https://anilist.co/staff/112033/Asanagi). The first volume was shipped on July 17 of 2020.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YochikoSAITO) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/21513611)

An animator, animation director and character designer.

_Note: Not to be confused with an older animator [Yoshiko Saitou](https://anilist.co/staff/200837/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

[Website](http://meganebanchow.com/) | [Blog](http://meganebanchow.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MeganeBanchow)

Also worked on the music for Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko as part of the unit Franz Maxwell I.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YochikoSAITO) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/21513611)

An animator, animation director and character designer.

_Note: Not to be confused with an older animator [Yoshiko Saitou](https://anilist.co/staff/200837/)._

[Website](http://yuiko-ohara.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaDjsWqUnBETKJ2NJqwdUeg/) |  [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ohara_yuiko) 

**Yuiko Oohara** is a Japanese singer and songwriter from Chiba Prefecture who is affiliated with Toho Animation Records. Starting her career as a live performer in 2012, she would also participate in several auditions and competitions. She made her major debut in 2015 with the song "Magic Parade", which was used as the theme song to the short film Little Witch Academia: The Enchanted Parade.

[Website](http://yuiko-ohara.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaDjsWqUnBETKJ2NJqwdUeg/) |  [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ohara_yuiko)

[Website](http://yuiko-ohara.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaDjsWqUnBETKJ2NJqwdUeg/) |  [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ohara_yuiko) 

**Yuiko Oohara** is a Japanese singer and songwriter from Chiba Prefecture who is affiliated with Toho Animation Records. Starting her career as a live performer in 2012, she would also participate in several auditions and competitions. She made her major debut in 2015 with the song "Magic Parade", which was used as the theme song to the short film Little Witch Academia: The Enchanted Parade.
__Keiji Oota__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. Managing Director at Toho.
__Nobuhiro Osawa__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. Currently President of Egg Firm, formerly affiliated with [Genco](https://www.genco.co.jp/).
